name: Ganea conjecture
summary:
Ganea's conjecture is a now disproved claim in algebraic topology.  It states that

  
    
      
        cat
        ⁡
        (
        X
        ×
        
          S
          
            n
          
        
        )
        =
        cat
        ⁡
        (
        X
        )
        +
        1
      
    
    {\displaystyle \operatorname {cat} (X\times S^{n})=\operatorname {cat} (X)+1}
  

for all 
  
    
      
        n
        >
        0
      
    
    {\displaystyle n>0}
